$comment: Output template for Context7 integration skill

budget_status.calls_used: {{calls_used: integer 0-3, number of Context7 API calls made}}
budget_status.warning: {{warning: optional string, shown when calls_used >= 2, e.g. 'Context7 budget: 2/3 calls used'}}

libraries.library_name: {{library_name: string, library name from manifest file, e.g. fastapi, react, express}}
libraries.docs_summary: {{docs_summary: string, summary of documentation from Context7 query-docs response}}
code_examples: {{example: string, code snippet from documentation, e.g. @app.get('/items/{item_id}')}}
relevant_sections: {{section: string, documentation section name, e.g. Dependencies}}
libraries.query_used: {{query: string, actual query sent to Context7 query-docs, e.g. How to implement JWT authentication in FastAPI}}

skipped_libraries.$comment: Libraries that were detected but not fetched due to budget/errors/priority
skipped_libraries.reason: {{reason: enum string, one of: 'Budget exhausted' | 'Not found in Context7' | 'Network error' | 'Resolution failed' | 'Low priority'}}

library_docs.status: {{status: enum string, one of: 'SUCCESS' | 'PARTIAL' | 'FAILED' | 'PLUGIN_NOT_AVAILABLE' | 'NO_LIBRARIES_DETECTED', overall skill execution status}}
